Summary: Witness was seated facing a window in his home talking to his 92 year old Mother when he glanced out the window and saw a round, silve object coming towards his home. It hovered, ascended at 45 degree angle and was gone.
trends: There have been 23 other sightings in Concord
There were no other sightings in Concord on or around January 28th 2007
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: Sighting DetailsWitness states he was seated in his living room, facing a window and talking with his 92 year old Mother when he happened to glance out the window and saw a round, silver object coming toward his home over a tree line. At first he thought it might be an aircraft but then it hovered. He called his wife but she could not locate it. The object ascended at a 45 degree angle until the window frame blocked his view. He immediately got up and wnet into the adjacent kitchen, opened the door to get a better look but the object was gone. He described the object as looking like a "pin ball" from a pin ball machine. He had no unusual feelings or sensations at the time but he felt compelled to contact NH MUFON via Email. This was his third sighting in as many years but those were in a different location on the west side of Concord, NH.
